author: rbb
msg: Fix a seg fault in mod_include.  When we are generating an
internal redirect, we must set r->uri to "", not a bogus

author: trawick
msg: get rid of a stray semicolon in a message written to stderr

author: trawick
msg: allow sysvsem to be selected as the accept mutex mechanism on AIX
the default for AIX remains unchanged (pthread)

author: wrowe
msg: Optimize location_walk.  We build an array of incremental matches, and
on attempting a subreq/redirect or simply a second pass, and for each
match in series, if the section is a match,  we reuse the merge result
